segments.text: Which movie is your favorite to watch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to say , my favorite movie is Superbad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Honestly , it is one of the funniest movies I've seen in a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right . That movie is hilarious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't think you saw that movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I went to see it the day it came out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was laughing through the whole movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bought the movie . Would you like to come to my house and watch it ?
segments.speaker: S1
